status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Error while hard return from Sockets> Listening socket.
This is not regression since error occurs in 2.1.0 build as well but error does not occur in 2.0.1 build.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Build KS with 2.1.2.
2) Navigate to Platform>Sockets>Listening socket
3) Click "socket state"
4) Click "Listen on 40404"
5) Telnet to the Android with command "telnet <Android's IP> 40404" from system on same network
6) Click "close"
7) Click "socket state"
8) Tap "back" button to leave test

Result:
Socket error is displayed.

Expected:
Normal resumption of tests
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Sockets - Error while closing Sockets > Listening socket through hardware back button
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.1.2.v20120824144611
STUDIO: 2.1.2.201208201549
DEVICES: Samsung galaxy tab(v 3.2)
OS: Mac OSX 10.8

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
